attributes.action: Allow High Court Judges to Sentence Young Offenders to a term of Conscription
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow Judges to be able to sentence persistent Young Offenders to a term of National Conscription. Minimum of 3 years.
Not only would this be a Deterrent it would also allow Offenders time away from their Environments, and, have pride, respect and Common Sense towards others!
At the very least it would take the Idiots who find themselves in front of a Judge some constructive work and allow good ethics to be set in place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
